patterns: How is the quality of food ensured?
responses: Our food is freshly prepared daily, using high-quality ingredients. Being homemade, we ensure the utmost hygiene and care in every step.

patterns: Do you provide only veg food?
responses: We only provide vegetarian food, freshly made at home.

patterns: How can I track my order?
responses: You can track your order in real-time by contacting our owner.

responses: Yes, join our loyalty program to earn points and enjoy exclusive discounts.

responses: Yes, you can purchase gift cards through our app.

responses: Yes, we offer catering services for small and large events. Contact us for more details.

patterns: Do you have discounts for new customers?
